mapper.sql: select p.id, p.name, p.description, p.manager_id, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.priority, p.status, p.created_time, p.update_time, u.real_name as manager_name from projects p left join users u on p.manager_id = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into projects(name, description, manager_id, start_date, end_date, priority, status, created_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{managerId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{createdTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE projects
name = #{name},
description = #{description},
manager_id = #{managerId},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
priority = #{priority},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
